typst_path.description:
Output path for the Typst file, relative to the input YAML file. The default value is `rendercv_output/NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE_CV.typ`.

The following placeholders can be used:

- MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month (e.g., January)
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month (e.g., Jan)
- MONTH: Month as a number (e.g., 1)
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits (e.g., 01)
- YEAR: Year as a number (e.g., 2024)
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits (e.g., 24)
- NAME: The name of the CV owner (e.g., John Doe)
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case (e.g., John_Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case (e.g., john_doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case (e.g., JOHN_DOE)
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case (e.g., John-Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case (e.g., john-doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case (e.g., JOHN-DOE)

pdf_path.description:
Output path for the PDF file, relative to the input YAML file. The default value is `rendercv_output/NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE_CV.pdf`.

The following placeholders can be used:

- MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month (e.g., January)
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month (e.g., Jan)

- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case (e.g., JOHN_DOE)
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case (e.g., John-Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case (e.g., john-doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case (e.g., JOHN-DOE)

main_column.description:
Template for education entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `INSTITUTION`: Institution name
- `AREA`: Field of study/major
- `DEGREE`: Degree type (e.g., BS, PhD)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**INSTITUTION**, AREA\nSUMMARY\nHIGHLIGHTS`.
main_column.title: Main Column

degree_column.description:
Optional degree column template. If provided, displays degree in separate column. If `null`, no degree column is shown. Available placeholders:
- `INSTITUTION`: Institution name
- `AREA`: Field of study/major
- `DEGREE`: Degree type (e.g., BS, PhD)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**DEGREE**`.
degree_column.title: Degree Column

date_and_location_column.description:
Template for education entry date/location column. Available placeholders:
- `INSTITUTION`: Institution name
- `AREA`: Field of study/major
- `DEGREE`: Degree type (e.g., BS, PhD)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `LOCATION\nDATE`.
date_and_location_column.title: Date And Location Column

main_column.description:
Template for normal entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `NAME`: Entry name/title
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**NAME**\nSUMMARY\nHIGHLIGHTS`.
main_column.title: Main Column

date_and_location_column.description:
Template for normal entry date/location column. Available placeholders:
- `NAME`: Entry name/title
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `LOCATION\nDATE`.
date_and_location_column.title: Date And Location Column

main_column.description:
Template for one-line entries. Available placeholders:
- `LABEL`: The label text (e.g., "Languages", "Citizenship")
- `DETAILS`: The details text (e.g., "English (native), Spanish (fluent)")

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**LABEL:** DETAILS`.

main_column.description:
Template for publication entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `TITLE`: Publication title
- `AUTHORS`: List of authors (formatted as comma-separated string)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary/abstract text
- `DOI`: Digital Object Identifier
- `URL`: Publication URL (if DOI not provided)
- `JOURNAL`: Journal/conference/venue name
- `DATE`: Formatted date

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**TITLE**\nSUMMARY\nAUTHORS\nURL (JOURNAL)`.
main_column.title: Main Column

- `URL`: Publication URL (if DOI not provided)
- `JOURNAL`: Journal/conference/venue name
- `DATE`: Formatted date

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `DATE`.

footer.description:
Template for the footer. Available placeholders:
- `NAME`: The CV owner's name from `cv.name`
- `PAGE_NUMBER`: Current page number
- `TOTAL_PAGES`: Total number of pages
- `CURRENT_DATE`: Formatted date based on `design.templates.single_date`
- `MONTH_NAME`: Full month name (e.g., January)
- `MONTH_ABBREVIATION`: Abbreviated month name (e.g., Jan)
- `MONTH`: Month number (e.g., 1)
- `MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Zero-padded month (e.g., 01)
- `YEAR`: Full year (e.g., 2025)
- `YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Two-digit year (e.g., 25)

The default value is `*NAME -- PAGE_NUMBER/TOTAL_PAGES*`.

phone_number_format.description: Phone number format. The default value is `national`.

hyperlink.description: Make contact information clickable in the PDF. The default value is `true`.
hyperlink.title: Hyperlink

show_icons.description: Show icons next to contact information. The default value is `true`.
show_icons.title: Show Icons

display_urls_instead_of_usernames.description: Display full URLs instead of labels. The default value is `false`.
display_urls_instead_of_usernames.title: Display Urls Instead Of Usernames

separator.description: Character(s) to separate contact items (e.g., '|' or '•'). Leave empty for no separator. The default value is `''`.
separator.title: Separator

space_between_connections.description: Horizontal space between contact items. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5cm`.

main_column.description:
Template for education entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `INSTITUTION`: Institution name
- `AREA`: Field of study/major
- `DEGREE`: Degree type (e.g., BS, PhD)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**INSTITUTION**, AREA\nSUMMARY\nHIGHLIGHTS`.
main_column.title: Main Column

degree_column.description:
Optional degree column template. If provided, displays degree in separate column. If `null`, no degree column is shown. Available placeholders:
- `INSTITUTION`: Institution name
- `AREA`: Field of study/major
- `DEGREE`: Degree type (e.g., BS, PhD)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**DEGREE**`.
degree_column.title: Degree Column

date_and_location_column.description:
Template for education entry date/location column. Available placeholders:
- `INSTITUTION`: Institution name
- `AREA`: Field of study/major
- `DEGREE`: Degree type (e.g., BS, PhD)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `LOCATION\nDATE`.
date_and_location_column.title: Date And Location Column

date_and_location_width.description: Width of the date/location column. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `4.15cm`.

side_space.description: Left and right margins. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.2cm`.

space_between_columns.description: Space between main content and date/location columns. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.1cm`.

allow_page_break.description: Allow page breaks within entries. If false, entries that don't fit will move to a new page. The default value is `false`.
allow_page_break.title: Allow Page Break

short_second_row.description: Shorten the second row to align with the date/location column. The default value is `true`.
short_second_row.title: Short Second Row

main_column.description:
Template for experience entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `COMPANY`: Company name
- `POSITION`: Job title/position
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**COMPANY**, POSITION\nSUMMARY\nHIGHLIGHTS`.
main_column.title: Main Column

date_and_location_column.description:
Template for experience entry date/location column. Available placeholders:
- `COMPANY`: Company name
- `POSITION`: Job title/position
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `LOCATION\nDATE`.
date_and_location_column.title: Date And Location Column

connections.description: The font family for connections. The default value is `Source Sans 3`.

section_titles.description: The font family for section titles. The default value is `Source Sans 3`.

body.description: The font size for body text. The default value is `10pt`.

name.description: The font size for the name. The default value is `30pt`.

headline.description: The font size for the headline. The default value is `10pt`.

connections.description: The font size for connections. The default value is `10pt`.

section_titles.description: The font size for section titles. The default value is `1.4em`.

alignment.description: Header alignment. Options: 'left', 'center', 'right'. The default value is `center`.

photo_width.description: Photo width. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `3.5cm`.

photo_position.description: Photo position (left or right). The default value is `left`.
photo_position.title: Photo Position

photo_space_left.description: Space to the left of the photo. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.4cm`.

photo_space_right.description: Space to the right of the photo. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.4cm`.

space_below_name.description: Space below your name. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7cm`.

space_below_headline.description: Space below the headline. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7cm`.

space_below_connections.description: Space below contact information. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7cm`.

connections.description: Contact information settings.

bullet.description: Bullet character for highlights. The default value is `•`.

nested_bullet.description: Bullet character for nested highlights. The default value is `•`.

space_left.description: Left indentation. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.15cm`.

space_above.description: Space above highlights. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0cm`.

space_between_items.description: Space between highlight items. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0cm`.

space_between_bullet_and_text.description: Space between bullet and text. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5em`.

underline.description: Underline hyperlinks. The default value is `false`.
underline.title: Underline

show_external_link_icon.description: Show an external link icon next to URLs. The default value is `false`.
show_external_link_icon.title: Show External Link Icon

main_column.description:
Template for normal entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `NAME`: Entry name/title
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**NAME**\nSUMMARY\nHIGHLIGHTS`.
main_column.title: Main Column

date_and_location_column.description:
Template for normal entry date/location column. Available placeholders:
- `NAME`: Entry name/title
- `SUMMARY`: Summary text
- `HIGHLIGHTS`: Bullet points list
- `LOCATION`: Location text
- `DATE`: Formatted date or date range

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `LOCATION\nDATE`.
date_and_location_column.title: Date And Location Column

main_column.description:
Template for one-line entries. Available placeholders:
- `LABEL`: The label text (e.g., "Languages", "Citizenship")
- `DETAILS`: The details text (e.g., "English (native), Spanish (fluent)")

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**LABEL:** DETAILS`.
main_column.title: Main Column

size.description: The page size. Use 'a4' (international standard) or 'us-letter' (US standard). The default value is `us-letter`.

top_margin.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7in`.

bottom_margin.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7in`.

left_margin.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7in`.

right_margin.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7in`.

show_footer.description: Show the footer at the bottom of pages. The default value is `true`.
show_footer.title: Show Footer

show_top_note.description: Show the top note at the top of the first page. The default value is `true`.
show_top_note.title: Show Top Note

main_column.description:
Template for publication entry main column. Available placeholders:
- `TITLE`: Publication title
- `AUTHORS`: List of authors (formatted as comma-separated string)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary/abstract text
- `DOI`: Digital Object Identifier
- `URL`: Publication URL (if DOI not provided)
- `JOURNAL`: Journal/conference/venue name
- `DATE`: Formatted date

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `**TITLE**\nSUMMARY\nAUTHORS\nURL (JOURNAL)`.
main_column.title: Main Column

date_and_location_column.description:
Template for publication entry date column. Available placeholders:
- `TITLE`: Publication title
- `AUTHORS`: List of authors (formatted as comma-separated string)
- `SUMMARY`: Summary/abstract text
- `DOI`: Digital Object Identifier
- `URL`: Publication URL (if DOI not provided)
- `JOURNAL`: Journal/conference/venue name
- `DATE`: Formatted date

You can also add arbitrary keys to entries and use them as UPPERCASE placeholders.

The default value is `DATE`.
date_and_location_column.title: Date And Location Column

type.description: Section title visual style. Use 'with_partial_line' for a line next to the title, 'with_full_line' for a line across the page, 'without_line' for no line, or 'moderncv' for the ModernCV style. The default value is `with_partial_line`.

line_thickness.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5pt`.

space_above.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5cm`.

space_below.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.3cm`.

allow_page_break.description: Allow page breaks within sections. If false, sections that don't fit will start on a new page. The default value is `true`.
allow_page_break.title: Allow Page Break

space_between_regular_entries.description: Vertical space between entries. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `1.2em`.

space_between_text_based_entries.description: Vertical space between text-based entries. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.3em`.

show_time_spans_in.description: Section titles where time spans (e.g., '2 years 3 months') should be displayed. The default value is `['experience']`.
show_time_spans_in.title: Show Time Spans In

space_above.description: Space above summary text. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0cm`.

space_left.description: Left margin for summary text. It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0cm`.

footer.description:
Template for the footer. Available placeholders:
- `NAME`: The CV owner's name from `cv.name`
- `PAGE_NUMBER`: Current page number
- `TOTAL_PAGES`: Total number of pages
- `CURRENT_DATE`: Formatted date based on `design.templates.single_date`
- `MONTH_NAME`: Full month name (e.g., January)
- `MONTH_ABBREVIATION`: Abbreviated month name (e.g., Jan)
- `MONTH`: Month number (e.g., 1)
- `MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Zero-padded month (e.g., 01)
- `YEAR`: Full year (e.g., 2025)
- `YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Two-digit year (e.g., 25)

The default value is `*NAME -- PAGE_NUMBER/TOTAL_PAGES*`.
footer.title: Footer

top_note.description:
Template for the top note. Available placeholders:
- `LAST_UPDATED`: Localized "last updated" text from `locale.last_updated`
- `CURRENT_DATE`: Formatted date based on `design.templates.single_date`
- `NAME`: The CV owner's name from `cv.name`
- `MONTH_NAME`: Full month name (e.g., January)
- `MONTH_ABBREVIATION`: Abbreviated month name (e.g., Jan)
- `MONTH`: Month number (e.g., 1)
- `MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Zero-padded month (e.g., 01)
- `YEAR`: Full year (e.g., 2025)
- `YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Two-digit year (e.g., 25)

The default value is `*LAST_UPDATED CURRENT_DATE*`.
top_note.title: Top Note

single_date.description:
Template for single dates. Available placeholders:
- `MONTH_NAME`: Full month name (e.g., January)
- `MONTH_ABBREVIATION`: Abbreviated month name (e.g., Jan)
- `MONTH`: Month number (e.g., 1)
- `MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Zero-padded month (e.g., 01)
- `YEAR`: Full year (e.g., 2025)
- `YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS`: Two-digit year (e.g., 25)

The default value is `MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR`.
single_date.title: Single Date

date_range.description:
Template for date ranges. Available placeholders:
- `START_DATE`: Formatted start date based on `design.templates.single_date`
- `END_DATE`: Formatted end date based on `design.templates.single_date` (or "present"/"ongoing" for current positions)

The default value is `START_DATE – END_DATE`.
date_range.title: Date Range

time_span.description:
Template for time spans (duration calculations). Available placeholders:
- `HOW_MANY_YEARS`: Number of years (e.g., 2)
- `YEARS`: Localized word for "years" from `locale.years` (or singular "year")
- `HOW_MANY_MONTHS`: Number of months (e.g., 3)
- `MONTHS`: Localized word for "months" from `locale.months` (or singular "month")

The default value is `HOW_MANY_YEARS YEARS HOW_MANY_MONTHS MONTHS`.
time_span.title: Time Span

line_spacing.description: Space between lines of text. Larger values create more vertical space. The default value is `0.6em`.

alignment.description: Text alignment. Options: 'left', 'justified' (spreads text across full width), 'justified-with-no-hyphenation' (justified without word breaks). The default value is `justified`.
alignment.title: Alignment

date_and_location_column_alignment.description: Alignment for dates and locations in entries. Options: 'left', 'center', 'right'. The default value is `right`.

font_family.description: The font family. You can provide a single font name as a string (applies to all elements), or a dictionary with keys 'body', 'name', 'headline', 'connections', and 'section_titles' to customize each element. Any system font can be used.
font_family.title: Font Family

small_caps.description: Small caps styling for different elements.

design.description: The design information of the CV. The default is the `classic` theme.
design.title: Design

locale.description: The locale catalog of the CV to allow the support of multiple languages.
locale.title: Locale Catalog
